title: Judging College QBs With Warren Sharp, Plus the Most Exciting Prospects With Danny Kelly | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
NFL expert Warren Sharp shares his favorite stats and metrics that make a college quarterback standout, explains why Joe Burrow’s NFL fit is so important, breaks down how NFL teams should be using analytics, and discusses the teams that helped themselves the most this offseason (1:20). Then Ringer draft guru Danny Kelly calls in to chat about the most exciting prospects in this year's draft (33:45).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Warren Sharp and Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
